content: Admission & Aid Types of Admission Visit DePaul Tuition Room & Board Scholarships Financial Aid Veteran Student Test Credit & PlacementCredit Given by ExamOnline Placement Process Credit Given by Exam Online Placement Process Check Your Application Status Admitted Students Deadlines Immunization Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Test Credit & Placement>Credit Given by Exam>IB International Baccalaureate (IB) Credit Awards â€‹ Students starting at DePaul will be awarded course credit in the amounts indicated below, provided official International Baccalaureate (IB) transcripts and final score reports are submitted to the Office of Admission prior to enrolling at DePaul. If you have completed an exam that is not listed below, please contact the Transfer Articulation Center atTrACPostingUpdates@depaul.edu. Group I - Best Language Group II - Second Language Group III - Individuals and Societies Group IV - Experimental Sciences Group V - Mathematics & Computer Sciences Group VI - The Arts Group VII - Theory of Knowledge
